channel.title:
University on
Wonyoung Jang
channel.description:
Recent content
in University
on Wonyoung Jang

item.title: Disaster Recovery Robot Simulation
item.description: Created an autonomous robotic system in [CoppeliaSim](https://www.coppeliarobotics.com/) for disaster recovery, demonstrating goal-seeking with sensor integration.

item.title: CS Career Recommendation Chatbot
item.description: Built a [Pandorabot](https://home.pandorabots.com/home.html) chatbot to help students find computing jobs matching their skills, assisting a university career advisor.

item.title: Package Delivery Route Optimization
item.description: Designing a hash table-based package delivery tracking system in Python, with package insertion, look-up, delivery routing, and a user interface.

item.title: Hotel Reservation Manager
item.description: Upgraded a [Spring](https://spring.io/projects/spring-framework) hotel booking app with multilingual, timezone, and currency features. Deployed via [Docker](https://www.docker.com/).

item.title: Vacation Cart Manager
item.description: Developed a [Spring](https://spring.io/projects/spring-framework) Java backend for a travel agency's web app, interfacing with an existing [Angular](https://angular.io/) front end, updating legacy systems.

item.title: Retail Inventory Manager
item.description: Customized a [Spring](https://spring.io/projects/spring-framework) app with HTML and Java for inventory management, showcasing software development skills for a client's needs.

item.title: DVD Rental Database Revenue Insights
item.description: Created a [PostgreSQL](https://www.postgresql.org/) lab report with SQL, extracting detailed data and summaries from the [DVD Rental Database](https://www.postgresqltutorial.com/postgresql-getting-started/postgresql-sample-database/) for a business query.

item.title: Student Record System
item.description: Developing a system in C++ to manage and maintain a student roster, involving data manipulation and object-oriented programming.

item.title: Bagel Corner and Mister Coffee Database Management
item.description: Built SQL database models for Bagel Corner & Mister Coffee, including ER diagrams, tables, and queries, plus data loading and reporting.
